articles.author: Levi Winslow
articles.title: Modern Warfare 3 Is Pulling The Hated 'Groot' Skin, For Now - Kotaku
articles.description: Developer Sledgehammer Games said it will rework the Gaia skin after player feedback
articles.content:
A controversial skin in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III is slated to get pulled following community backlash over visual issues with the buyable cosmetic.

articles.title: Massive genetic study finds genes linked to cannabis addiction - Nature.com
articles.description: Data from more than one million genomes offer fresh insights into excessive cannabis use and its relationship to other diseases.

articles.author: Madhumita Murgia, George Hammond
articles.title: Majority of OpenAI staff threaten to quit unless Sam Altman is reinstated - Financial Times
articles.description: Majority of employees threaten to join former chief at new Microsoft AI unit unless directors resign
articles.content: OpenAI faced a growing revolt among staff and investors calling for the resignation of three directors after a botched boardroom coup ousted chief executive Sam Altman from the worlds leading artific… [+5969 chars]
